summary: Removed all links to experience.html from navigation menus across all pages. Also removed the 'Learn More' button link to experience.html from the Experience section in index.html.
current_status: All links to experience.html have been removed from navigation menus and content sections. The Experience page has been deleted and all references to it have been cleaned up across the website.
